page.title: 10Whitley Rose Queen Fete
page.content: The Rose Queen Fete started on 23 July 1947. The school organized it for four years then it was taken over by the village, which formed a Rose Queen committee. On the committee there are about 20-22 people.The first girl ever to be {Queen}was chosen because she fitted in the Headmistress' wedding dress. Years ago at the Rose Queen you could eat as much as you liked for{1/6 Now all the money goes to the fund for the old peoples party at Christmas.But all the children taking part in the procession are provided with a special tea in a marquee. At the Rose Queen there are stalls,tombola,bouncy castle fairground rides, pram races, sticky buns,Magican,Punch and Judy shows. The Rose Queen officially starts by a procession from the school round the village: a white pony leads, then the Band playing,followed by the Cubs.p.11
